name: Stinging Storm
description: Mark enemies with abilities, deal more damage with attacks, then trigger the magic array to set off an explosive chain!

name: Berserker's Domain
description: With the lion's soul by your side, grow stronger the longer you fight. Weave attacks into your abilities to become an all-round berserker!

name: Since You're Here
description: An unbroken crowd control chain that evolves into a mobile gravity field, trapping enemies with no escape!

name: Torment Engine
description: The harder they hit you, the harder you hit back! It's too late for them to run!

name: Kitty Missile
description: Projectiles fly faster, deal increased damage, have shorter cooldowns, and ricochet to other targets on hit. Bounce your heart out!

name: Power of Arrays
description: Arrays automatically track and burn enemies, and trigger a meteor shower with a large area of effect, creating a cycle of bombardment.

name: Stack 'em Attacks
description: Attacks stack true damage, and combined with splashing feathers and bouncing crossblades, they overwhelm enemies. Let them feel the full force of the barrage storm!

name: Lupine Stance
description: Dash to summon a lupine soul that assists your attacks and steal infinitely stacking movement speed to dominate the battlefield.

name: Lupine Spellblade
description: Trigger multiple Spellblade effects, leaving your enemies dazzled and defeated!

name: Healing Heartsong
description: Chain heals, shields, and abilities to become the most lovable sustain machine on the battlefield!

name: Burning Heartsong
description: What's sweet to one is bitter to another. Who knew healing could deal so much damage too!

name: Forbidden Series
description: Combine Omnivamp with a slow effect in an area to endlessly harvest resources, achieving continuous stat growth.

name: Spellblade Chain
description: Chain multiple Spellblade effects to buff yourself and weaken the enemy, allowing you to control the flow of battle

name: Super Dodgy
description: Steal stats to grow in size and Resistances, growing stronger over time through damage taken and crowd control effects.

name: Stance Specialist
description: Combines your movement abilities with invisibility and shields. Taking damage reduces cooldowns, becoming as mobile as a phantom on the battlefield.

name: Mana Control
description: Converts Mana into damage and Health, and allows you to stack multiple items, giving you an overwhelming stat advantage.

name: Moonlight Resonance
description: Attack Speed increases vamp efficiency, and synergy with Ultimate Spellbook abilities deals massive amounts of damage. The higher your Attack Speed, the higher your sustain.

name: Monstrous Might
description: Grow in size while stealing Health and Movement Speed. Combined with increasing true damage and Resistances, you'll turn into a behemoth on the battlefield.

name: Mini Might
description: Shrink in size and gain Movement Speed and Armor Pen. Additionally, deal bonus damage against larger enemies, punching above your weight

name: Salvation Link
description: Your heals and shields spread to allies and reduce cooldowns, forming a continuous support system for your team.

name: Echoing Shields
description: While shielded, gain immunity to crowd control and bonus Movement Speed, and reflect incoming damage. Become a walking fortress on the battlefield!

name: Shooter Expertise
description: Unleash a dazzling barrage of attacks, clearing enemies with overwhelming force.

name: Windrider
description: Movement Speed increases your damage and Heal Power, applies slow, and reduces cooldowns, making it the core of your battle prowess

name: Rampant Flaws
description: Empowers all aspects of Critical Strikes for burst damage that dominates the battlefield.

name: Control Expert
description: A dual-loop strategy where crowd control and survivability fuel each other.
